projects.title: Movie Database
projects.tools: React | TanStack Query | TailwindCSS | React Router

overview.title: Project Overview
overview.rolesTitle: Role(s): Developer | UI/UX Designer | Team Lead
overviewPoints: This project is a React-based web application that integrates with the TMDB (The Movie Database) API to provide users with a comprehensive platform for browsing and discovering movies.
Users can search for films, view detailed information such as ratings, release dates, and synopses, and explore popular, upcoming, and top-rated movies.
The app features a responsive design, ensuring seamless usability across devices, and includes dynamic filtering and sorting options for an enhanced user experience.
By leveraging React's component-based architecture, the project delivers a fast, interactive, and visually appealing interface for movie enthusiasts.

requirements.title: Project Requirements
requirementsPoints: The project requirements involved building an application connected to the themoviedb.org API, we use the TanStack Query Library to complete theses fetches .
The main page needed to display a grid of at least 12 movies, with sorting options based on popularity, top ratings, current screenings, and upcoming releases.

Each movie card would link to a dedicated movie page, displaying detailed information like an overview and a backdrop image. Additionally, a favorites page was designed to show all movies saved by the user.Â

reflections.title: Reflections
reflections.sectionTitle1: How did I feel about it?
reflections.sectionContent: Building the React database project was both challenging and rewarding, as it allowed me to deepen my understanding of state management and API integration. I felt a sense of accomplishment when I successfully implemented features like dynamic sorting and a synchronized favorites system. However, debugging and optimizing performance were occasionally frustrating, though they ultimately helped me grow as a developer.
sectionContent2: Installing both dev and regular dependencies
